20101218141108.500|20101218141111.000|TR0|SOT: Igor Voroshkevich
20101218141111.000|20101218141113.500|TR0|
20101218141113.500|20101218141116.000|TR0|I remember, in 1994, we were
20101218141116.000|20101218141118.500|TR0|touring the country. We didn't
20101218141118.500|20101218141121.000|TR0|really know who Lukashenko was

20101218141126.000|20101218141128.500|TR0|favourite, Kebich. But one of my

20101218141131.000|20101218141133.500|TR0|wins, thats the end of our
20101218141133.500|20101218141136.000|TR0|country". I still don't know how

20101218141203.500|20101218141206.000|TR0|chance. But it all depends on
